title: Sophisticated Stay at the First Sofitel in Russia
description: The grandeur of St. Petersburg, Russia’s imperial capital, is at your feet with a stay at the stylish So Sofitel Saint Petersburg. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the so-called ‘Venice of the North’ with an ultra-chic stay at the first Sofitel in the country and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, a dry hydro massage treatment, unlimited access to the hotel’s wellness area and gym and a guaranteed upgrade to a SO Urban room.
offer_address: Voznesensky Ave, 6, Sankt-Peterburg, Leningradskaya oblast', Russia, 190000

title: Top-Rated Five-Star Heritage Luxury in the Heart of St. Petersburg
description:
Housed in an illustrious St. Petersburg landmark, Lotte Hotel St. Petersburg is an award-winning luxury hotel, ideally located in the very heart of the city. A member of the acclaimed Leading Hotels of the World collection, this revered five-star establishment sits on the Moyka River embankment, directly across from St Isaac’s Cathedral and a short walk from leading attractions such as Savior on the Spilled Blood, Palace Square, the Mariinsky Theatre and State Hermitage Museum. Since its first mention in historical records dating to 1802, this Art Nouveau mansion has hosted eminent guests and famous figures and served as the private residence for the first US Ambassador to the Russian Empire, John Quincy Adams, who later became the sixth President of the USA.

Don't miss the opportunity to enjoy arguably the finest afternoon tea in St. Petersburg under the stained-glass dome of The Lounge, toast to the spectacular view at L Terrasa terrace bar, dine on Japanese at MEGUmi, unwind in the tranquil Balinese Mandara Spa, or simply sink into the comfort of your room or suite.
